name: MISSKET
description:
GAME

A game about destroying other players by colliding with them, There will be random obstacles in maps and you can throw other players to either get hurt by those obstacles or shoot yourself towards it to get a power-up.

This game was made for a school project at Namik Kemal University.
It is a fairly simple multiplayer game, however, multiplayer support might be downed later on since now it is a leftover project.
